summary:
Thank you for downloading Kira :)
<br />This is the fixed version the wrong files got downloaded before... opps
descriptionHtml:
When downloading you must put the file in your skyrim folder, once it's in and you load your game
open the console command with ~ and Type help kira
After you find her code, you will be able to type player.placeatme with the code following and she'll spawn up

This is the fixed version the wrong files got downloaded before... opps

She worked perfect on my game. Let me know if she is having issues on yours :)

Some have said you may find her in the Alchemy shop in whiterun!
author: xdanikitty915x
